description.narrative: This activity (Federal Public Administration Programme -Design/Implementation) is a component of Federal Public Administration Reform Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £24,755,458. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Public sector policy and administrative management, Public finance management (PFM), Anti-corruption organisations and institutions, Domestic revenue mobilisation. , with the following implementing partners: Atos IT Services Ltd. The start date is 01-01-2010 and the end date is 30-04-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
